Posts.Content: i am taking aromasin, to lower the estrogen in my body as i am estrogen receptor cancer. you have got me worried i hate taking any drugs i always feel doctors use you as a guniea pig,and they dont really care how you feel and if you feel that the drugs are wearing you doen then they give you some thing else. it is early stages i will let you know how i feel later.take care savi..
Posts.Title: aromasin side effects

Posts.Content: i am sorry to hear about the cancer. i had bilteral mastectomy nearly 12 years ago. it was awful as i felt part of my womenhood was being taken away from me. what the doctors did is to use the fat from the tummy to rebuild my breasts i didnt want anything inserted. they said that was the best,and they told me that i was getting a tummy tuck as well,so i thought why not. it took a while to heal but i noticed the size and shape had changed so i dont know i think you must talk to the doctors and tell them exactly what you want. takecare and keep in touch..
Posts.Title: newly diagnosed

Posts.Content: hi saw your message, i have had cancer for 15 years, on and off, during which they recommanded that i take tamafoxen, aramosin exmestne, not all together of course!!. i never did each time went back the doctors will say oh you have been on it for 3 years lets change it now etc. i looked at the side effects, and i thought i just couldnt the doctors never knew. right now they have come back saying we want you to take fasledex and that being an injection, i cant get away from it, but seeing the side effects makes me cringe, and the consulant was saying angry i was asking a month to think about it. she went on to say if i dont decide it that all options have been exhausted and the next step if cancer goes anywhere else is chemotherapy...
Posts.Title: Aromisin

Posts.Content: thanks very much , for replying, i dont want anyone to look at me and know i am a cancer patient but i am seeing the side effects, i still have a week to decide and i will let you know about my decision.  wrong spelling i know, rushing and typing, please dont listen to everything doctors tell you, i did agree for the operations because i knew i had no choice, at the end of it, this is your beautiful body, the people who sell the medecine want to make the money, they dont care about feeling....but will let you know about my fasledex....
Posts.Title: Aromisin
